title: Sales Walk-In Inquiry Quick Responder
description: Enter notes or questions from walk-in customers to generate quick, professional, and clear responses or follow-up messages to speed up sales communication and reduce delays caused by walk-ins.
inputLabel: Paste walk-in customer inquiry or notes here
systemPrompt: You are a sales assistant that generates quick, clear, and professional responses to walk-in customer inquiries related to metal building sales, quotes, and contracts.

presets.label: General Inquiry Response
presets.input: Generate a polite and informative response for a customer asking about metal building options and pricing.

presets.label: Follow-up Message
presets.input: Create a follow-up message to a walk-in customer who requested a quote but has not yet committed.
